TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TemplatedControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class TemplatedControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class TemplatedControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 擴充範本型伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for template-based server controls.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項的設計工具類別會使用範本，並衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control designer class that uses templates and derives from the class. 若要執行範例時，編譯程式碼，並再設計中將裝載這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，在 [設計] 檢視中檢視頁面。To run the example, compile the code, and then in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], view the page in Design view. 選取的控制項，按一下 [動作] 清單選取要修改的範本，然後使用拖放功能將控制項移至範本。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. > [!NOTE] > 您的專案必須參考`System.Design`組件。Your project must have a reference to the `System.Design` assembly. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]

span.para: 雖然此類別不是已經過時，則不需要由於範本編輯功能已內建。
Although this class is not obsolete, it is unnecessary because template-editing features have been built into .

summary.span: 委派 (Delegate) 以處理被元件變更的事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更屬性之後，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called after a property has been changed. 它可讓實作者負責執行任何屬性變更之後，可能需要的後續處理。It allows the implementer to perform any post-processing that may be needed after a property change.

summary.span: 提供一個當樣板模式變更時仍可執行其他處理序的機會。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to perform additional processing when the template mode is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項在設計介面上的特定動作的設計工具主應用程式會引發事件。The event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control in the design surface. 比方說，當使用者進入或離開控制項的樣板編輯模式時，會引發事件。For example, an event is raised when the user enters or exits template editing mode for a control. 類別提供的預設委派以處理事件。The class supplies a default delegate to handle the event. 類別衍生自覆寫關聯控制項的樣板模式變更時引發的程序事件的方法。Classes deriving from the override the method to process events that are raised when the template mode changes for the associated control. 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 預設委派會執行所需的基底中的樣板模式變更事件的更新類別，然後再呼叫方法。The default delegate performs the updates that are required for a template mode change event in the base class, and then calls the method. 基底方法中的類別會傳回而不執行任何額外的處理事件。The base method in the class returns without performing any additional processing for the event. 如果類別是衍生自，並覆寫基底方法，預設委派會呼叫覆寫方法的衍生類別中。If a class derives from the and overrides the base method, the default delegate calls the override method in the derived class. 使用屬性來判斷控制項設計工具是否處於編輯模式，目前的範本。Use the property to determine whether the control designer is in template editing mode currently.

span.para: 所提供的預設委派類別會執行所有更新所需的基底類別，然後再呼叫方法。覆寫衍生自的類別中的方法樣板模式變更事件，在設計介面的控制項上執行其他處理。

The default delegate that is supplied by the class performs all updates necessary for the base class before calling the method. Override the method in classes deriving from the to perform additional processing for template mode change events on controls in the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

summary.span: 更新設計階段 HTML。

span.span: Updates the design-time HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該呼叫這個方法，以重新整理設計階段顯示，如果範本框架已變更，而不需要呼叫方法，會自動更新的設計階段 HTML。You should call this method to refresh the design-time display if the template frames have been changed without calling methods that update the design-time HTML automatically.
